About - Baytree Care Services Skip to content Home About Team Our Care Our Homes Contact Refer a User Refer a User Main Menu About About Founded in  1997, we believe in empowering our service users through providing  holistic support and  care. We’re change-makers with a rich history of blending good old-fashioned compassion with a sprinkle of innovation that keeps us ahead of the curve. At our core, we’re all about real, genuine support that uplifts the mind, body, and soul. We don’t believe in one-size-fits-all, because let’s face it, each person’s mental health journey is as unique as they are. So, our care plans are just as personalized. We get it; life hasn’t been a smooth ride for many of our residents. Past hospitalizations and not-so-successful placements? We’ve seen it, and we’re not daunted. We stand by our mantra that ‘Every Story Matters.’ At Baytree Care, we don’t just see or hear you; we value you. We’re passionate about uplifting each individual and encouraging them to bloom into their best selves. That’s why our mission isn’t just a tagline; it’s what we breathe every day: to empower you and pave the way to a life rich with independence and fulfilment. Now, don’t get us wrong; we’re not stuck in our ways. In fact, we’re always on the move, leading the charge in the UK’s mental health scene. Our care plans are living, breathing entities that adapt with you, aimed at creating well-rounded recovery paths that lead to real, tangible outcomes. We value community and recognize that strong human connections can be the best medicine for the soul. Our Mission At Baytree Care, our mission is to be more than just a healthcare provider; we are your partners in transformation. We believe in offering holistic, personalized care that respects the uniqueness of each individual’s mental health journey. Through our innovative and evolving models of care,  and community integration, we empower our residents to lead fulfilling, independent lives deeply integrated within their communities. At Baytree Care, we don’t just support—we transform. Our Values Our foundation rests on four solid pillars: Empowerment, Growth,  Vitality and innovation.  These words are the essence of who we are. From our front-line staff to our back-office teams, we all stay true to our core these values. Our values keeps us agile, allowing us to continually adapt and discover new avenues for enriching lives. Growth We are committed to helping each of our service users and also our team members  grow and thrive in parallel by creating a culture that leads each individual to  to fulfil their own potential. Vitality Vitality is our guiding star, central to everything we do is a core belief that physical and mental health work hand in hand. We strive to promote both physical and mental well being of our service users and staff in parallel. Innovation We use technology to leverage our ideas and ability to add value, we encourage our service users and team to regularly share new ideas, with a constant openness to try new new ways of delivering positive outcomes for our residents. Supporting Apprenticeships – Baytree Solutions info@baytreesolutions.co.uk 03301 332079 Linkedin Instagram Facebook Baytree Solutions About Services Team Consultation Articles Contact Supporting Apprenticeships Baytree take growth and development seriously At Baytree, supporting apprenticeships is crucial, we do this by offering opportunities to learn and develop useful skills. Our apprentices get a chance to engage with all areas of the business, from testing IT solutions to customer relations. Our latest apprentice Kayleigh has written about her time with us so far. My name is Kayleigh Bennett and I am the apprentice business administrator here at Baytree Solutions, I study level 3 business administration in college within this role. This time last year I was really struggling to find what I wanted to do as a career. My confidence was very low and I had no self-esteem, this lead me to stay at home and shy away from the working life as I believed I wouldn’t be good enough in any job role. Everything changed for me in January 2021 when I was given an amazing opportunity to become an apprentice at Baytree. Leading up to the new job I was feeling very nervous and started to doubt myself worrying about how I would manage this new role as I was putting a lot of pressure on myself. When I started the new job I spent the first couple of weeks completing training with support from my manager, over these few weeks I felt this pressure I was putting on myself disappear, since then I have taken on every task I have been given with newfound confidence. I really enjoy getting involved in tasks that I am usually unfamiliar with, I take this as an opportunity to develop my skills and knowledge in new areas to build up my confidence. I have learned so much during my time working at Baytree Solutions. Having had no previous experience working in IT or social housing, I wasn’t aware of how housing associations operated or how IT solutions can help. During my time with Baytree, I have developed a good understanding of the CRM system and how much it can help housing associations. I really enjoy testing our CRM system after it has been designed and built. I also enjoy how I am constantly learning something new every day within our organisation and the social housing sector. When I have completed my tasks I feel proud of what I have completed and proud to present it to my manager. To be able to contribute to the business with the work I have completed throughout my time at Baytree and the appreciation I am shown for this always spurs me on to work harder on the next task so that I am constantly gaining more confidence and believing in myself. I can’t thank the team at Baytree enough for all the support they have provided me with during my time here, they are always encouraging and supporting me along the way to try new tasks and achieve higher goals. This then pushes me to work to the best of my ability so that I am reaching the goals I set out for myself and feeling proud of my achievements. If you sat me down this time last year and told me what I would be doing in a years’ time, I would never have believed you. I’m grateful to Baytree Solutions for giving me this opportunity as this has allowed me to see just how capable I am of achieving so much during my time here, which I could never have pictured myself doing a year ago. I am feeling proud of myself for how far I’ve come in the past year, I look forward to continuing my progress and growth and seeing what the future holds for me! Baytree is a place where every player will have a great time. We’re on Golf Digest’s list of the “Top 75 Places to Play in Florida” and joined 12 PGA Tour venues in re-grassing our greens to CHAMPION Dwarf Bermudagrass ~ the BEST greens! Attention to Detail – At Baytree, we love hosting golf events at our course and have a PGA staff that knows what it takes to stage a successful, fun-filled outing that will run smoothly regardless of size. Whether you are planning a corporate, charity, or social golf tournament, our Club takes pride in giving you special attention to meet your golfing needs from 20 to 144 players. Great Food – Baytree will provide delicious food and can host an awards banquet in the Clubhouse or on the outdoor patio overlooking the course. We will customize a menu just for you, ranging from hot dogs and hamburgers, to BBQ pork and chicken, or even a Prime Rib buffet. You can have gourmet or casual food served for buffets, box lunches and continental breakfasts. Outstanding Service – The professional team at Baytree will provide outstanding service to your golfers. Among the special touches, we can include personalized scorecards, PGA professional scoring, and great golf contests.
